CustomField.formula: If( ISPICKVAL(ISNetworld_Status__c,'Subscriber') , ((ISN_Company_Record__r.YTD_Logins__c / Month(Today())) + (ISN_Company_Record__r.Prior_Year_Logins__c / 12 * (12 - Month(Today()))) / 12 / ISN_Company_Record__r.Active_Users__c / ISN_Company_Record__r.TotalContractors__c) , ((ISN_Company_Record__r.YTD_Logins__c / Month(Renewal_Date__c)) + (ISN_Company_Record__r.Prior_Year_Logins__c / 12 * (12 - Month(Renewal_Date__c))) / 12 / ISN_Company_Record__r.Active_Users__c / ISN_Company_Record__r.TotalContractors__c))
CustomField.label: Avg Logins / Employee / Contractor
